attributes.action: Demand an apology from President Cristina Fernandez of Argentina regarding the disrespectful TV commercial filmed unlawfully on the Falkland Islands.
attributes.additional_details: The government of the United Kingdom and Northern Ireland must demand a full and unreserved apology off President Cristina Fernandez of Argentina and her respective government for the disrespectful advert promoting the hopes of Argentinean athletes during the London 2012 Olympics. The use of a British WWI war memorial without permission is not only disrespectful to those who fought for our country, it is also degrading to those who live on the Falkland Islands whose territory was used to film propaganda without their permission.
